703361f-a.title: Brooklyn: Buffalo Avenue - Herkimer Street.
703361f-a.text:
Buffalo Avenue (right), at the N. W. corner of Herkimer Street,
showing the coal yard of the Fulton Coal Company. Note the display
of old carriages and carriage wheels.
July 13, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
703361f-a.folder: Buffalo Avenue & Herkimer Street., Brooklyn, NY

704883f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Buffalo Avenue
704883f-a.text:
Herkimer Street, east of Buffalo to Ralph Aves., showing in the center,
the rectory and school, and to the left of them, the steeple of St. Benedict's
Church. (R.C.)
April 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
